location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Watson Henshaw, Marine Agent, Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter concerns a complaint made by the Marine Agent against an officer of the Country Ship Margaret; it notes that the officer is accused of having severely beaten a native pilot. The two parties to the complaint are instructed to detail the circumstances to the Resident.
